question: Many peoples are copying celebrity from magazines and on TV. Why is this happening? Do you think it is a good idea to copy celebrities.
text: In the world today, the majority of the young generation follows celebrities  from magazines and on TV.  Common people who are fans of popular celebrity try to copy them when they watch these famous persons and read articles about them. The desire to live a glamorous and luxury life like them. However , I tend to believe that copying famous personalities is a bad  tendency. Now I would like to explore my viewpoints on this statement before forming a conclusion.

To embark on, there is the various reason for this craze among people to follow celebrities. Due to  social media , youngster aware of their celebrities. people often think of celebrities as their ideal and they try to copy their style and footsteps to achieve success. Some people put themself under pressure to look as beautiful as celebrities. for example,  adolescents are attracted towards the fashion sense of media starts which they believe that he or she looks like one of their favourite celebrities. They spent a large  of their income to buy things.

Moreover, one reason is that people who call themselves a fan of a favourite celebrity and they have a desire to be famous in  society. People imitate actor or actress to look more stylish and classy. By doing this, they try to gain the attraction of the society even though it might not match their personality either or they are not comfortable with it. for example ,  women who wear high heels in their office by mimicking  a TV actress would find it very hard to work a whole day on heels.

By the way of conclusion, it is true  that  the majority of people try to imitate their favourite TV actor or actress,  which is not right. They should try to follow only good things from others such as principles and values.
